title: Liquor licenses (on-premises, off-premises, catering)
dataVerified: Licensee name, business name, address, license type, capacity, hours
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake liquor licenses. Domain binding verifies ABC/liquor control board. High-value licenses ($10K-$500K+ value). Public display requirement. Prevents illegal alcohol sales. Transfer/sale verification.
